description: The BR-34 Regional Transport Office serves the Khagaria district in Bihar, operating under the Munger Division. It is responsible for vehicle registration, issuance of driving licenses, and enforcement of road safety regulations in a region characterized by its location at the confluence of several major rivers including the Ganga and Gandak. The office plays a critical role in managing transport logistics for both agricultural and commercial sectors within the district's seven administrative blocks.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, DTO Road, Ward No. 15, Khagaria, Bihar
